metadata.title: CVE-2022-26499 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An SSRF issue was discovered in Asterisk through 19.x. When usingSTIR/SHAKEN, it's possible to send arbitrary requests (such as GET) tointerfaces such as localhost by using the Identity header. This is fixed in16.25.2, 18.11.2, and 19.3.2.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
